constituent: ill, sickness, hospital, third class, one, ceiling, inside
koohiiStory1: Caveman got ill after flying third class. The cabin air and food got to him. (Primitive: these all got MUCH easier when using CAVEMAN instead. ).
koohiiStory2: If you hang around a third class hospital, you´ll get ill with the sickness everyone else has.
readingExamples: 病気 (びょうき), 病根 (びょうこん), 看病 (かんびょう), 病む (や.む), 病 (やまい)
words:
臆病(おくびょう): cowardice, timidity
発病(はつびょう): attack (disease)
病(やまい): illness, disease
病む(やむ): to fall ill, to be ill
看病(かんびょう): nursing (a patient)
病院(びょういん): hospital
病気(びょうき): illness, disease, sickness
